fields.name: A4 Colour Multifunction Laser Printer
fields.description:
Kyocera ECOSYS M5521cdw in More Detail
With great results across its functions, modern features and an efficient design, the Kyocera ECOSYS M5521cdw Multifunction is a superb choice for busy offices with diverse demands.

Brilliant results
With excellent capabilities as a colour printer, scanner, photocopier and fax machine, there are few offices that wouldn't benefit from the fantastic results of the Kyocera ECOSYS M5521cdw multifunction. Printing 21 pages per minute in both mono and colour, with the first page delivered as fast as 13 seconds, the resolutions are exceptional at 1200 x 1200 dots per inch, making light work of anything from vivid colour photos to sharp, professional graphs, tables and emails.

Making life simpler
On top of its user-friendly print, scan, copy and fax functions, the device also benefits from a range of other well considered design features. Changing consumables such as toner cartridges is a marked contrast to the often complex processes of other devices, and the printer's excellent compatibility with Mac and PC operating systems allows for real convenience. Its connectivity to wireless and network devices, as well as cloud software through AirPrint and Mopria, make for a printer that is accessible to all, and easy to use.

Efficiency at its core
The consumables of this device are long lasting, combining high yields and low operating temperatures that reduce the waste, downtime, energy costs and carbon footprint for the device, where generic items may increase them and potentially damage the device. The excellent paper handling and integrated double-sided printing of the printer furthers its efficiency, meaning that each of the pages is used to its maximum and that there will be less need to change paper during busy print jobs. The cost per page is very low, making for a particularly cost effective printer.Kyocera ECOSYS M5521cdw in More Detail
With great results across its functions, modern features and an efficient design, the Kyocera ECOSYS M5521cdw Multifunction is a superb choice for busy offices with diverse demands.

Brilliant results
With excellent capabilities as a colour printer, scanner, photocopier and fax machine, there are few offices that wouldn't benefit from the fantastic results of the Kyocera ECOSYS M5521cdw multifunction. Printing 21 pages per minute in both mono and colour, with the first page delivered as fast as 13 seconds, the resolutions are exceptional at 1200 x 1200 dots per inch, making light work of anything from vivid colour photos to sharp, professional graphs, tables and emails.

Making life simpler
On top of its user-friendly print, scan, copy and fax functions, the device also benefits from a range of other well considered design features. Changing consumables such as toner cartridges is a marked contrast to the often complex processes of other devices, and the printer's excellent compatibility with Mac and PC operating systems allows for real convenience. Its connectivity to wireless and network devices, as well as cloud software through AirPrint and Mopria, make for a printer that is accessible to all, and easy to use.

Efficiency at its core
The consumables of this device are long lasting, combining high yields and low operating temperatures that reduce the waste, downtime, energy costs and carbon footprint for the device, where generic items may increase them and potentially damage the device. The excellent paper handling and integrated double-sided printing of the printer furthers its efficiency, meaning that each of the pages is used to its maximum and that there will be less need to change paper during busy print jobs. The cost per page is very low, making for a particularly cost effective printer.

fields.name: A3 Colour Laser Printer
fields.description:
Xerox VersaLink C8000DT in More Detail
This printer is packed with some of Xerox’s most impressive new technology, making it an invaluable workplace assistant. It’s built to provide small to medium businesses with highly professional prints every time and contains a host of customisable features to enhance productivity.

Xerox VersaLink C8000

Xerox ConnectKey Technology
The first thing you’ll notice is the intuitive control pad. The gesture-based app interface makes setting up and using the printer as simple and familiar as using a phone or tablet. ConnectKey enables instant access to its cloud-hosted services for optimum productivity and offers a connection to other devices at the tap of a screen. This also means the printer can be used and monitored remotely. ConnectKey also supports GDPR-compliant security features that protect both documents and data at every level.


Customisable to work the way you do
A gallery of available apps allows you to configure your printer to meet the exact needs of your workplace. The Simple ID system gives individuals and groups secure access to their personalised jobs, settings and contacts via a single login. It’s also straightforward to print from a range of different devices. Connect easily to Google Drive, Microsoft, DropBox, and most leading cloud printing services, with apps to ensure that the service you need is at your fingertips when you need it.

Professional results with no waiting
This printer aims for minimal downtime for maintenance or repair. Elimination of unnecessary moving parts, together with strong components contribute to the reliability of this sturdy machine. It handles most useful media sizes up to A3, and prints up to 45 pages per minute, with a first page in as little as 11 seconds. Crisp vibrant colour and optimum readability are a priority, with precise results even at larger sizes. Expect up to 20,000 high-quality pages per month.

fields.name: A4 Colour Multifunction Inkjet Wireless Printer
fields.description:
Epson EcoTank ET-4750 in More Detail
If your office needs a compact and stylish printer that's feature rich and designed to slash your overheads while delivering high-quality prints, meet the Epson EcoTank ET-4750 A4 Colour Multifunction Inkjet Printer. This four in one print solution is right at home in a business printing environment with plenty of value added features like duplex printing, a 30 sheet ADF and a 250 sheet front tray designed to make any printing job a snap.


Introducing the next generation EcoTank
EcoTank printers use Epson's innovative high capacity ink tank to do away with cartridges, meaning your printer is always productivity ready. And with the ink tank now front mounted on these next generation printers, mess and spills are virtually eliminated for fuss free filling. Thanks to new bottle design, you'll never fill the wrong tank with the wrong colour again.


Ultra low running costs
Capable of printing 14k pages black and 11.2k pages colour using the two full sets of inks provided (Bk – 127ml, CMY – 70ml)*, the Epson EcoTank ET-4750 can cut your printing costs by a staggering 74%. These ultra low running costs will slash your overheads with no compromise on print quality.


Print from anywhere
With WiFi and WiFi Direct plus an intuitive colour touchscreen, help menus and a range of mobile print apps, the Epson EcoTank ET-4750 can help you print anything from just about anywhere using the Epson iPrint app and Epson Email Print.

Business quality printing
The Epson EcoTank ET-4750 uses a four colour inkset of dye and pigment inks to deliver exceptional crisp and clean prints time after time. Using Epson's PrecisionCore print head, variable sized droplet technology and EcoTank inks, you'll experience vibrant and true to life colours and razor sharp monochrome text at print speeds of up to 15ppm mono (ISO), 8ppm colour (ISO) and up to 4,800 x 1,200 dpi resolution.
